altername_name: Pekin Express: La Route de l'Himalaya
name: Pékin Express: La Route de l'Himalaya
overview: Embark on an extraordinary race on the Himalayan road, from Beijing to Bombay! Compete against 10 other teams of candidates on a journey of more than 10,000 km to discover China, Nepal and India. - Connect the stage towns as quickly as possible by participating in frantic minigames that will require you to reflexes and speed. - At each stage, a new immunity test awaits you, at the end of which a team will be eliminated. - Competition and exotic landscapes await you in this fabulous Beijing Express adventure! - Stéphane Rotenberg is your race director: he guides you throughout your journey. - Live the highlights of the show: as on TV, the events are linked across the world and at each stage, a team is eliminated.
